com.microsoft.band

Class BandClientManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.microsoft.band.BandClientManager

  • public final class BandClientManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for getting paired Microsoft Bands and creating new instances of BandClient

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      BandClient create(android.content.Context context, BandInfo device)
      Method to create a new BandClient for communicating with the Microsoft Band represented by the given BandInfo object
      static BandClientManager getInstance()
      Method to get the static instance of this class
      BandInfo[] getPairedBands()
      Method to get an array of all paired Microsoft Bands as BandInfo objects

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public BandClient create(android.content.Context context,
                BandInfo device)
        Method to create a new BandClient for communicating with the Microsoft Band represented by the given BandInfo object
        Parameters:
        context - a Context object for binding to Microsoft Health's band communication service
        device - a BandInfo object representing the Microsoft Band the returned BandClient should communicate with
        Returns:
        a new BandClient for communicating with the Microsoft Band represented by the given BandInfo object

      • getInstance

        public static BandClientManager getInstance()
        Method to get the static instance of this class
        Returns:
        the static instance of this class

      • getPairedBands

        public BandInfo[] getPairedBands()
        Method to get an array of all paired Microsoft Bands as BandInfo objects
        Returns:
        an array of all paired Microsoft Bands as BandInfo objects
        Throws:
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the following permission is not declared in your manifest: android.permission.BLUETOOTH
